listitem.para: ...but that doesn't mean they won't deploy bullying tactics
A response to assist in dealing with fear
Empathy and patience but also zero-tolerance
Manifests as (often transparent) fallacies — too many to list
Finally, whenever you come against bullying or denial, parody it
Make fun of it and do it relentlessly, with the intention of provoking introspection
Violation of the contract of intellectual discourse is an unfortunate possible outcome, but be prepared for it
Importantly, declare victory and move on
